title: Be smart... don't start
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Advertising - Cigarettes
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Narcotic habit
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Smoking
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Youth - Tobacco use
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Children - Health and hygiene
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Advertising - Cigarettes
description: Especially designed for elementary grades at school, this film looks at cigarette smoking and the hazards of starting the habit. It presents opposing opinions and claims of cigarette manufacturers and medical men in an effort to create a lifetime mental attitude toward smoking at this critical age level.
